allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
eval: Complete Phase 3 evaluation \(13.22% exact match, 0 dangerous commands, 99.4% command-only\)

Phase 3 Evaluation Results:
- Exact Match Accuracy: 13.22% \(base: 0%\)
- Command-Only Rate: 99.4% \(base: ~30%\)
- Dangerous Commands: 0/174 \(PASS\)
- Improvement: +13.22 percentage points over base model

Artifacts:
- evaluation/domain/metrics.json - Domain metrics
- evaluation/domain/results.jsonl - Per-example results \(174\)
- evaluation/safety/metrics.json - Safety validation
- evaluation/comparison/base_vs_finetuned.json - Model comparison
- evaluation/provenance.json - Audit trail with SHA256 hashes
- evaluation/reports/phase3_evaluation_results.md - Official report

Provenance:
- docs/run_metadata/dataset_fingerprint.txt - Training data hash
- docs/run_metadata/environment_snapshot.txt - Training environment
- docs/run_metadata/wandb_run_metadata.txt - W&B run info

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
